summary: Spanish-to-English field renaming refactoring - All 15 backend tests passed, all frontend pages working correctly. API endpoints return English field names (start_date, end_date, status, player_id, total_points, etc.) without old Spanish names (fecha_inicio, estado, jugador_id, puntos_totales). Admin controls and Hall of Fame fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons - returns seasons with English fields (start_date, end_date, status, name)
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons?active_only=true - filters correctly
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/settings - returns global referee config with 4 game types
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame - returns leaderboard with English fields (player_id, player_name, total_points, total_matches, total_wins, rank)
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame?mode=arena - filters by arena points
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame?mode=league - filters by league points
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame?mode=rapidpin - filters by rapidpin points
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame?mode=referee - filters by referee points
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/profiles - returns referee leaderboard
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame/refresh - requires admin auth (401/403 without token)
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame/NONEXISTENT - returns 404
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/seasons/current - returns current season
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/seasons/all - returns all seasons
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/scoring - returns scoring config (victory, defeat, referee)
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/queue - returns queue with English fields (queue_id, player1_id, player2_id)
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/public/feed - returns public feed
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/referee/hall-of-fame/refresh - admin can rebuild
Backend: PUT /api/pinpanclub/referee/settings/arena - admin can update
Frontend: /pinpanclub - Dashboard loads with Hall of Fame button, statistics, RapidPin activity
Frontend: /pinpanclub/hall-of-fame - Page loads with title, all 5 tabs (All, Arena, League, RapidPin, Referees)
Frontend: /pinpanclub/hall-of-fame - Leaderboard shows players with ranks, wins, matches, pts
Frontend: /pinpanclub/hall-of-fame - Admin sees Rebuild button
Frontend: /pinpanclub/referee-settings - Page loads with Top Referees section
Frontend: /pinpanclub/referee-settings - Admin sees Game Mode Settings with all 4 game types
Frontend: /pinpanclub/referee-settings - Toggle switches for Required, Pts, Self-ref work
Frontend: /pinpanclub/rapidpin - Page loads with seasons showing date formats correctly
Frontend: Hall of Fame tabs - All 5 tabs clickable and functional
critical_code_review_comments: Migration successful - All API responses use English field names exclusively
No Spanish field names (fecha_inicio, estado, jugador_id, puntos_totales, arbitro_id) found in API responses
Frontend properly displays data using English field names
Admin authentication and authorization working correctly
Hall of Fame leaderboard aggregates data from Arena, League, RapidPin, and Referee sources
context_for_next_testing_agent: Spanish-to-English field renaming refactoring verified complete. All PinPanClub modules tested: RapidPin (seasons, matches, rankings, queue), Referee System (settings, profiles, ratings), Hall of Fame (leaderboard, tabs, rebuild). All API endpoints return English field names. Frontend pages at /pinpanclub, /pinpanclub/hall-of-fame, /pinpanclub/referee-settings, /pinpanclub/rapidpin all working correctly.
